# Toronto Harbour Accelormeter Telemetry Project - Largemouth Bass and Nothern Pike


Code and data for manuscript focused whether an industrialized and impaired harobur front (i.e., Toronto Harbour) impacts habitat connectivity and activity (i.e., acceleration) of Largemouth Bass (*Micropterus salmoides*), and Northern Pike (*Esox lucius*).
